title: 如何把皮肤拖进Jar？
author: zhaoxingeabc
txt_content:
同上，求解
是不是要安装什么软件？

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content: 用压缩软件解压.minecraft\versions\版本号\版本号.jar，并更换\assets\minecraft\textures\entity的steve.png

replies.author: zhaoxingeabc
replies.txt_content:
_Benson_ 发表于 2015-4-6 17:05
用压缩软件解压.minecraft\versions\版本号\版本号.jar，并更换\assets\minecraft\textures\entity的steve. ...
然后怎么办？

replies.author: zhaoxingeabc
replies.txt_content:
_Benson_ 发表于 2015-4-6 17:05
用压缩软件解压.minecraft\versions\版本号\版本号.jar，并更换\assets\minecraft\textures\entity的steve. ...
最后还是用皮肤站弄好了……分怎么办？

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/642c9d34c266a2644b46f771.html 除了这几步，还需要先把下下来的皮肤改名叫“steve”，之后替换即可。不懂追问

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 我只是给LZ提个醒，选最佳请选择上面本森的回答
